as promised and made Rauq update the map which he did most liekly 
entirely of his own accord but I shall take the cradit by saying I 
made him do it!

~qs7 honest politician

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@y...> wrote:
> since your updating the map remember that the cybers base the 
trippa is located in russia. and
